IMUSim
Package imusim :: Package platforms :: Module magnetometers :: Class HMC105x

Class HMC105x

source code

Model of the Honeywell HMC105x magnetometer as used in the Orient-3 IMU.

N.B. This model includes an INA321 instrument amplifier circuit.

The HMC105x has a sensitivity of 1mV/V/Gauss +- 20%. IMUSim uses Teslas for magnetic field measurements, where 1 Tesla = 10,000 Gauss.

The Orient-3 design uses an INA321 precision instrument amplifier with a gain of 380+-1% to amplify the magnetometer signal prior to sampling.

Method Details

__init__(self, platform, noiseStdDev, rng=None, **kwargs)
(Constructor)

source code 

Initialise sensor.

Parameters:
  • platform - Platform this sensor will be attached to.
  • positionOffset - Position offset vector of this sensor in the local co-ordinate frame of its host platform.
  • rotationOffset - Rotation offset quaternion of this sensor in the local co-ordinate frame of its host platform.
  • noiseStdDev - Standard deviation of measured output voltage noise in the system in which the magnetometer is integrated.
  • rng - np.random.RandomState from which to draw imperfections.
